bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: Histogram Iteration Listener: gradient/param mean magnitudes display problem
bug.description:
The following images are taken from the LSTM character example. Essentially the parameters/gradient mean magnitude displays are all empty, except for the top layer that incorrectly contains data for all layers: <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/13898284/3a372f64-ee20-11e5-9331-427c5124cbde.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/13898285/443a7c28-ee20-11e5-9ca4-06491ffd2327.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
